attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Outcomes,if any,of the petitions submitted to this site should be constantly audited by No 10 Downing Street Staff who are responsible for the petitions site. This would enable them to provide answers under the Freedom of Information Act, about what action has been taken, if any, on submitted petitions that have expired. To date, such answers have been 'this information is not collated.'
Such auditing action would give some credibility to the petitions site, and go some way to disarming the widely held perception that it is just another instrument of Government spin and subterfuge to make the Electorate think that they have a voice, when in reality they have none.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
